title: SA Insider Guide: SA's hottest events happening this weekend | Traveller24
text:
{{item.title}} 
Cape Town - Valentines doesn't have to be over just yet. South Africa has some of the best events to still spend time with your favourite person - or people. 
If you're in Johannesburg, go check out the Night Out For Two package at Silver Star, and if you're in the Mother City, enjoy good food, fine wine and great company at the annual Harvest Festival at Muratie Estate in Stellenbosch. 
In Durban, the Morning Market has delicious artisanal and locally-sourced farm produce for foodies, while Port Elizabeth has the low-down on laugh out loud as comedian Evita Bezuidenhoutâ€™s show will be on at the Boardwalk. 
Where will you #FindYourEscape from 17 - 19 February 2017?
